content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 33, "index": 22}, {"type": "bow", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 25, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 12, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft a soul torch, I need to craft charcoal. To craft charcoal, I need to smelt oak wood, so I will move the oak wood from slot 31 to an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 31 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft a soul torch, I need to craft a stick. To craft a stick, I need to move bamboo to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
